title: Fraternity Scandals Exposed! For Men Only (1952) Crime, Drama | Full Colorized Movie

sources.title: Fraternity Scandals Exposed! For Men Only (1952) Crime, Drama | Full Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Professor Stephen Brice becomes suspicious of a student's accidental death, suspecting it was connected to his refusal to participate in a dangerous hazing ritual. As he investigates against the university's wishes, he unravels a web of deceit and endangerment.

Original title: For Men Only (1952)  AKA: The Tall Lie / Hell Night

Original Black & White version: https://youtu.be/VZjEq9cFyCw


Director: Paul Henreid
Writers: Herb Margolis, Lou Morheim
Stars: Paul Henreid, Margaret Field, James Dobson
Genres: Colorized classics. Crime, Drama

00:00 Full Movie & introduction
01:40  A group of individuals are going through an initiation process for a fraternity.
11:37  Tod is going through a tough initiation process for a fraternity and his girlfriend is worried about him.
17:36  A group of fraternity pledges go through a series of psychological and physical tasks as part of their initiation.
28:38  A fraternity initiation goes wrong when a dog is killed, leading to a investigation and conflicting stories.
34:52  A conversation takes place between various characters regarding a dog incident and its potential consequences.
48:34  A student at Wake University is hospitalized after suffering humiliation during a fraternity initiation.
49:51  A college scandal involving fraternity hazing sparks a debate among faculty members.
55:14  Dr. Brice's colleagues express their fear of supporting a meeting publicly, while his wife tries to convince him to cancel the meeting to secure a dean's appointment.
1:07:59  Dr. Brice is falsely accused of misconduct and is ultimately fired from his teaching position at Wake College.
1:16:18  A person reflects on leaving a school and the controversy surrounding a girl named Tracy Norman.
1:21:37  Dr. Brice tries to find Mr. Brown and discovers that Beanie Brown lied about contacting the Board of Regents.
1:28:34  A football player's hand injury leads to a confrontation with his professor and the revelation of a cover-up.
